name: The Covid Express
description:
Welcome to The Covid Express. Your goal is to keep the R rate below 1. Good luck! 

The Covid Express is a game set on a busy London Underground train. The user plays as ‘Hasmat', a character who is tasked with ensuring social distancing guidelines are adhered to. This is done by either physically grabbing and moving passengers further apart,  or by giving them a face mask. Each iteration is completely random, meaning the number of passengers and seat choice changes every time the game is played.  I’ve built it using a combination of the scripts provided by LabX and my own scripts, and used real life data. It's a lighthearted game, built from scratch using Unity, Maya and ZBrush.  

I have built this game on my own as part of the "Jamming the Curve" game jam. It's still a work in progress and I will continue to add more features - if you have any feedback or suggestions I would love to hear them! Thanks and enjoy.
